text: Pichata raai yoraa lokasakale allahara raachulara biraud'dhacarana karai bahi thakake ananda bodha karaile arau sihamtara dhana-sampada arau jiranara dbaraa allahara pathata jihada karaaka apachanda karaile, lagate sihamte ka’le, ‘garamara majata abhiyanalai ola'i nayaba’. Koraa, ‘jahannamara ju'i iyatakai bechi uttapta’, yadi sihamte bujilehemtena
